title: Drawing Characters in Adobe Illustrator
headline: Learn, design, and create stunning flat vector characters in Adobe Illustrator with this free online course.
description: Ever wondered how those fantastic characters or images you saw on a logo or website were created. Do you also want to design such stunning images or characters all by yourself? If yes, then this free online course is perfect for you. The step by step tutorial guides you to easily learn all the essential tools and techniques of Adobe Illustrator. It will help you quickly design and create impressive flat vector characters or images of your own.
courseDescription:
Adobe Illustrator is a software program used for designing stunning vector graphics, illustrations, shapes, characters, or other related items for print, web, and other mediums. It is the preferred choice for designers, illustrators, artists, or creative amateurs around the globe. The best thing about Illustrator is that it is easy to learn and navigate. This free online course by Alison is designed to teach you to create three distinct characters using simple vector shapes. You will be familiarized with all the basic menus, tools, and techniques of Adobe Illustrator to help you with the job.

The course is divided into three different modules. Each module is further divided into various topics to help you easily understand all the processes. The first module teaches you to use simple vector shapes to draw three different body-type characters. The second module will help you create an imposing vector knight. And once your vector knight is completed, the third and the last module will guide you through designing and creating a magnificent Orc character, all using simple vector shapes.

So if you are somebody who would like to create different vector characters or art on print, signboards or web, this course is best suited for you. This course is also perfect for illustrators, graphic designers or digital game artists who want to revise and update their skills on Adobe Illustrator for more creative opportunities. Enrol now and have fun by learning to create stunning flat characters by modifying simple vector shapes and drawings in Adobe Illustrator.
